ygData.subject: Whoops.
ygData.msgSnippet: I just went and look at the list settings, and I was not getting any notification of pending messages or user subscriptions, which resulted in messages being
ygData.rawEmail:
X-Digest-Num: 13
Message-ID: <17248.13.30.959279670@...>
Date: Tue, 9 Feb 1999 17:41:23 +0000
From: "Seth Mitchell" <smitchell@...
Subject: Whoops.

I just went and look at the list settings, and I was not getting any 
notification of pending messages or user subscriptions, which 
resulted in messages being lost and some being sent late.  

To prevent this, the list is no longer moterated, so please, no 
swearing, no pirating, and no files.  

Thank you,

--
SgMitchell
smitchell@...
